title: Locus Project Configuration
description: Configuration file for a Locus AI project (.locus/config.json)

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor validation and autocomplete

version.description: The Locus CLI version that initialized or last updated this project

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the project was initialized

projectPath.description: Relative path to the project root (typically ".")

workspaceId.description: The Locus workspace ID this project is linked to
